channel.title: flames cocktails on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in flames cocktails on courtside nyc

item.title: sappe
item.description: thoughts they have semi private room for party of 8, super cozy staff were so kind and patient with my large group pre-fixe $80 for more than 8 people menu highlights online cocktail menu krapow moo grob

item.title: figure eight
item.description: menu highlights long beans sun chokes corn jalepeño bolobao

item.title: fish cheeks
item.description: menu highlights coconut crab curry branzino

item.title: cathédrale
item.description: thoughts space is beautfiul, so much fun for birthday dinner menu highlights octopus, tomatoes

item.title: motel no tell
item.description: menu highlets fries were low-key gas milkshake

item.title: laser wolf
item.description: thoughts bar seating is first come first serve and they have a lot of seats menu highlights i’m hesitant to put anything here because everything was a hit. there were no misses, so you can’t go wrong. tuna shishlik

item.title: el pinguino
item.description: thoughts fully converted me to a tin fish stan menu highlights curry tuna mini hotdogs

item.title: principe
item.description: thoughts great bar scene, asked for an americano and i didn’t have to explain not the coffee menu highlights key lime pie ice cream sandwich

item.title: singlish
item.description: thoughts bar tender was so nice and lovely to chat with :) space is tiny so def need resy menu highlights they’ve got some really nice whiskey

item.title: madeline's martini
item.description: thoughts great date spot menu highlights french martini

item.title: omar's kitchen & rum bar
item.description: thoughts literally everything is good

item.title: nonna dora's
item.description: thoughts in a city with an italian restaurant on every block, this place soars above the average food was amazing and the staff were so so kind! menu highlights meatballs they have a negroni menu

item.title: kings co imperial
item.description: see locations thoughts great patio action in williamsburg location menu highlights egg rolls were gas

item.title: swan room
item.description: thoughts vibes are immaculate. the space is an old converted bank. the ceilings are high and ornate. feels like you’re in a james bond movie.

item.title: 11 tigers
item.description: thoughts chaotic but wasn’t mad about it, fit the vibe

item.title: thai diner
item.description: thoughts i have waited anywhere from 20 mins to 1.5 hours for a table here, but it’s deinitely worth it. better to get there early, put your name in, and grab a drink at one of the million bars in the area. i recommend mother’s ruin they have limited resys, but i think they’re more flexible for a large party of more than 7. menu highlights disco fries pea shoots mango sticky rice

item.title: rule of thirds
item.description: thoughts had my company holiday party here and it was a huge hit, also surprisingly affordable for 35 people. menu highlights duck fried chicken rice cooker pudding - not for everyone but i loved it.

item.title: semma
item.description: thoughts the best restaurant in new york. such a tough res, but i think bar seating might be first come first serve. they only book through resy and allow max number of 6 people per table. menu highlights can’t go wrong. you could blindly point at the menu and end up with the best meal of your life. pre-ordering the dungeness crab is so worth it.

item.title: the izakaya
item.description: thoughts two locations. original is on 6th and newer is on 4th menu highlights kastu sandwich usually sells out, people line up for it

item.title: the tyger
item.description: menu highlights osyters are unreal. served with crispy shallots. miso butter escargot (if you’re feeling adventurous) some of the most fun cocktails i’ve ever had

item.title: rosie's
item.description: thoughts skews young ceviche (if it’s still on the menu)

item.title: dante
item.description: thoughts best cocktail bar in new york. menu highlights martini negroni
